fields.title: line integrals
fields.pointers:
*  [Green's Theorem](greens_theorem)  is a powerful theorem relating line integrals to integrals of functions
*  [Surface integrals](surface_integrals)  are the higher-dimensional analogue
fields.summary: The line integral gives a notion of integrating a vector field along a curve. Common uses include computing work done by a force and finding potential functions corresponding to a gradient field.
